龙山小学位于台湾嘉义县竹崎乡 , 毗邻梅山断层、九芎坑断层、大尖山断层、触口断层、木屐寮断层 , 且学区境内的龙山村、文峰村目前是泥石流潜在高危险村落 , 防灾教育相当重要。本研究主要探讨防灾教育对龙山小学学生的教学成效。经问卷调查学生之防灾背景 , 了解龙山小学学生对防灾的前置概念 , 设计符合该校的防灾教育课程 , 实施防灾教育 , 然后进行防灾教育施测及质性研究资料收集 , 探讨防灾教育对学生在防灾知识、防灾技能、防灾态度等三方面的教学成效以及三者间的相关性 , 以作为防灾教学之参考依据。研究结果:1 ) 施行防灾教育对学校整体防灾知识、防灾技能等各个方面均具教学成效 ; 2 ) 学生在防灾态度上均持正面积极态度 ; 3 ) 学生的防灾知识与防灾技能之间中度相关 , 因此学校推行防灾教育时 , 加强防灾知识便能增强学生防灾技能 ; 4 ) 学生背景 ( 性别、家长教育程度、家长职业、教养状况、家长年龄、上学所乘交通工具、学生灾害恐惧程度 ) 与学生的防灾知识、防灾技能、防灾态度无显著相关性。longshan primari school locat zhoushan township , chiayi counti , taiwan , adjac meishan fault , jiuaxiong fault , dajian mountain fault , contact fault , clog liuxiao fault , school district longshan villag , wenfeng villag current debri flow potenti high risk villag , disast prevent educ import . studi mainli discuss teach effect disast prevent educ longshan primari school student . questionnair survey student explor background disast prevent , understand longshan primari school student disast prevent concept , design meet school 's disast prevent educ cours , implement disast prevent educ , disast prevent educ qualiti research data collect , paper discuss teach effect disast prevent educ three aspect disast prevent knowledg , disast prevent skill disast prevent attitud , correl three refer disast prevent teach . 1 ) implement disast prevent educ school 's overal disast prevent knowledg , disast prevent skill aspect teach effect ; 2 ) student disast prevent attitud posit posit attitud ; 3 ) student disast prevent knowledg prevent 4 ) student background ( gender , parent educ , parent occup , parent statu , parent age , school place , parent educ , parent educ , parent educ , parent educ , parent educ , parent educ signific correl student ' disast prevent knowledg , disast prevent skill disast prevent attitud
